杏仁豆腐.definition: almond tofu; almond jelly (dessert made with apricot kernel milk, sugar and agar)

杏林.definition: forest of apricot trees; (fig.) honorific term for fine doctor (cf Dr Dong Feng 董奉[Dong3 Feng4], 3rd century AD, asked his patients to plant apricot trees instead of paying fees)

杏林區.definition: Xinglin District of Xiamen city 廈門市|厦门市[Xia4 men2 shi4] (renamed Haicang District 海滄區|海沧区[Hai3 cang1 Qu1] in 2003)

杏花嶺.definition: Xinghualing district of Taiyuan city 太原市[Tai4 yuan2 shi4], Shanxi

杏花嶺區.definition: Xinghualing district of Taiyuan city 太原市[Tai4 yuan2 shi4], Shanxi

杏花村.definition: village of blossoming apricot trees where one can find a wineshop (reference to the famous poem 清明 by 杜牧[Du4 Mu4])
